question_text: How can quad-channel memory architecture improve performance compared to dual-channel?
answer_options: By enabling error correction code (ECC) on all modules
By doubling memory size per channel automatically
By allowing simultaneous data paths to four memory modules
By supporting different memory speeds in each channel
correct_answer: By allowing simultaneous data paths to four memory modules
explanation: Quad-channel memory increases total memory throughput by using four separate communication paths to transfer data in parallel.
